title: Zapslide
longdesc: Zapslide is a social network and blogging platform that I created, it is a hobby site where I can curate content that I find interesting and also a playground where I can test different web development ideas

title: Inspiration
longdesc: Inspiration is a realtime web app with Firebase, it features svbtle-style kudos buttons and the logic is controlled with AngularJS

title: Bitaware
longdesc: Bitaware was made for a hackathon app for Coinbase competition, it uses the OAuth2 Library PassportJS to go along with the NodeJS backend. It also has Firebase and AngularJS on the front end

title: Angular Ads
longdesc: Angular Ads is an open-source custom angular directive I made, it takes affiliate links and makes them into advertisement, I made it with the intentions of being a more control ad platform alternative to Google Adsense

title: Shoobx Hangman
longdesc: Node JS on the backend, AngularJS on the front, hangman game created as a programming assignment for a startup called Shoobx

title: Diary & Journal
longdesc: Diary and Journal is a mobile application built with phonegap and AngularJS, it is a HTML5 hybrid application that feels native and it is built with no dependency on jquery

title: Olajide
longdesc: olaji.de is my personal site which was built with the front-end bootstrap and a minimal design, the full domain is my first name, Olajide

title: Red October
longdesc: Red October is a HTML5 game I made with the Japanese gaming framework enchant.js, it is made of 6 different mini-games

title: Johnny Manziel Timeline
longdesc: The Johnny Manziel or Johnny football timeline is a timeline made with the TimelineJS and chronicles one of the most entertaining football player in America

title: Harlem Shake
longdesc: The Harlem Shake project is a 3D audio visualization of a song that became viral over the internet, it uses ThreeJS and a new HTML5 api for audio

title: MJ vs LBJ
longdesc: This project compares the statistics of two legendary NBA players, Michael Jordan and Lebron James, it uses Zurb's Foundation for the front-end and uses Google Graph API to display the data

title: Trig Practice
longdesc: I made this project to help quick me on the basic of trig identities while I was taking calculus in college, it uses AngularJS and a few regular expressions to match patterns

title: UI Test
longdesc: The Cogo Labs UI test was a UI challenge I took when I applied for Cogo Labs, I used AngularJS for my implementation

title: JqueryMobile Food
longdesc: This project was made in a few hours at one of the first hackathons I participated in, it uses jQueryMobile

title: Portfolio
longdesc: My portfolio is a place where I keep my personal projects, it uses AngularJS and bootstrap for the front-end
